mapper.select: select count(*) from STUDENT where STU_ID=#{stu_id} and STU_PWD=#{stu_pwd}
select count(*) from Teacher where tea_ID=#{tea_id} and tea_PWD=#{tea_pwd}
select count(*) from MANAGER where mana_ID=#{mana_id} and mana_PWD=#{mana_pwd}

SELECT CASE WHEN #{id} = t.tea_id THEN 'tea' WHEN #{id} = s.stu_id THEN 'stu' WHEN #{id} = m.mana_id THEN 'mana' END "result" FROM teacher t FULL OUTER JOIN student s ON 1=0 FULL OUTER JOIN manager m ON 1=0 WHERE #{id} IN (t.tea_id, s.stu_id, m.mana_id);
